body:
So after watching Deji's latest video, I found this website that allows you to view any website at any point in time. So I found the earliest version of the mczone website: https://web.archive.org/web/20121103070246/http://mczone.co
You guys may have heard of this website before

title: Avicus Back in the day

replies.body: MC Zone updated to Avicus ~2 months before I joined the first time... rip :(

replies.body: God I love the wayback machine.

replies.body: I see Avicus, as today, had some spelling issues. ;)

replies.body: Why couldn't you post this on a Thursday? #tbt >.<
